callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(Economy.AnyLabourChangeWanted && Economy.CombinedWantedLabour == 0 && (PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount - Economy.ExLabourMovementCost) > 0, Loc("tooltip_labour_accept_ok"), GetIfElse((PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount - Economy.ExLabourMovementCost) < 0, Loc("tooltip_labour_cant_afford_cost"), GetIfElse(Economy.AnyLabourChangeWanted, Loc("tooltip_labour_accept_changes_unbalanced"), Loc("tooltip_labour_accept_no_changes"))))

localised_text.tooltip_text: No changes have been made or labour surplus is not 0

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(Economy.AnyLabourChangeWanted && Economy.CombinedWantedLabour == 0 && (PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount - Economy.ExLabourMovementCost) > 0, Loc("tooltip_labour_accept_ok"), GetIfElse((PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount - Economy.ExLabourMovementCost) < 0, Loc("tooltip_labour_cant_afford_cost"), GetIfElse(Economy.AnyLabourChangeWanted, Loc("tooltip_labour_accept_changes_unbalanced"), Loc("tooltip_labour_accept_no_changes"))))

localised_text.tooltip_text: No changes have been made or Labour surplus is not 0
Cancel all pending changes and close labour overlay
When checked, this province will gain an equal share of any new [[img:icon_labour]][[/img]]Labour your faction receives

red.name: red
red.tooltip: You can't afford the associated cost of moving Labour

red.name: red
red.tooltip: You can't afford the associated cost of moving Labour

dy_province_name.component_level_text: Montanhas da borda do mundo de Southlands

property.name: yellow
property.value: (provinces = ProvinceList.Filter(ExWorkload.Total > 0)) => RoundFloat(provinces.Sum(100 - ExEfficiency.Total) / provinces.Size) > 49 && RoundFloat(provinces.Sum(100 - ExEfficiency.Total) / provinces.Size) < 100

happy.name: happy
happy.tooltip: Under control||The population is either happy, or too scared of you to do anything!||Although both will keep order in your province, a happy population will increase town growth.

neutral.name: neutral
neutral.tooltip: Neutral||The population are neither unhappy nor completely under your control.||You may wish to take steps to improve your control over them, such as increasing repression.

unhappy.name: unhappy
unhappy.tooltip: Unhappy||The population is unhappy and could easily riot and rebel.||Increase repression in this area to keep things from getting worse.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 1, ToNumber(ChildContext("dy_growth").CurrentText)), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 3), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

(descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 0, ToNumber(ChildContext("dy_efficiency").CurrentText)), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 6), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

(descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 1, ToNumber(ChildContext("amount").CurrentText)), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 4), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

sort_labour_actions.componentleveltooltip: Sort by number of available Labour actions

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 1, ChildContext("labour_buttonset").ChildList.Filter(CurrentState != "inactive").Size), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 2), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

sort_new_intake.componentleveltooltip: Sort by if accepting new intake
